items.sentence: I can go a couple of days without eating if I have to.
How long have Tom and Mary been yelling at each other?
How long have you been working as a parking attendant?
How many hours of sleep did you really get last night?
How much longer do you think Tom will want to do that?
Tom asked me to help Mary put new frets on her guitar.
Next time, you should wear something more appropriate.
One good thing about winter is there are no mosquitos.
Tom works six days a week but only gets paid for five.
Tom doesn\'t want to do anything that will upset Mary.
